content: approximately 15 and sew seam of hat brim on the inside insert elastic and weave into stitches of round 18 pull snugly to fit tie elastic and weave in ends thank you to my testers knitinbliss mmcrochet and honeystalks if you have any questions or comments or just want to join like-minded souls please join my ravelry group at http //www ravelry com/groups/anastacia-knits-designs thanks newsboy cap v 4 13 2014
